p: The params variable is a default prop loaded by the Plenti generator automatically. It holds all the
key/value pairs from the query string (everything after a ?) of the URL in a URLSearchParams object.
This can be helpful when interacting with APIs that use callback URLs with specific parameters.
The params prop won't work with server-side rendering (SSR) so you need to check if
the params are available first, before trying to use them. If you have a URL like
